data.partBlankContent: Jim loves to read. He re__ three bo___ this we__! On Friday, h_ will g_ to t__ bookstore t_ choose t__ new bo___. Then, he c__ read a__ weekend. One d__, Jim wants t_ write bo___ too. He is going to study English at a university.
data.fullContent: Jim loves to read. He read three books this week! On Friday, he will go to the bookstore to choose the new books. Then, he can read all weekend. One day, Jim wants to write books too. He is going to study English at a university.
data.answer: 吉姆喜欢读书。他这个星期读了三本书!星期五，他要去书店选两本新书。然后，他可以阅读整个周末。有一天，吉姆也想写书。他将在一所大学学习英语。
